metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12459 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The bfd_mach_o_read_symtab_strtab function in bfd/mach-o.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heap write and possibly achieve code execution via a crafted mach-o file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29.1-1ubuntu1').
